dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, March 07, 2006 7:58 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright infringement

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Monday, March 06, 2006
at
18:46:48 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] copyright infringement

MESSAGE BODY:
this website hosted on one of the servers from your datacenter is stealing
our webdesign and use our brands in false claims.
www.penis-pills-info.info
our website is
www.penisformula.com

ip:67.19.222.53
network:Organization-Name:Ilie Adrian
network:Organization-City:Targoviste
network:Organization-Zip:130010
network:Organization-Country:RO

we contacted in many times the webmaster of this website
www.penis-pills-info but he never replayed..also all the informations from
the register company are fake..please enforce the copyright rules from your
policy ASAP.

another email from our local Legal representant company will be sent to all
three parts ..webmaster, your abuse/copyright dept and to the sponsor that
this webmaster is working for.. this sponsor is selling some other stuff
then our brands.

again, hope that we will solve this as soon as possible since you already
have in your TOS stated this very clear.
thank you for your future support.
with respect,
Dan,
Sales Manager
Cash-guru.com
Innovative Trends Corporation
+1-630-982-2116
